name: Just Another Space Shooter by Canana
name_original: Just Another Space Shooter by Canana
description:
Send me your highscores here! https://discord.gg/4f6Cqkz

I created this game in 6 days, over a total of 36 hours

I enjoyed Galaga when I was little and I decided the first thing I'd make in PICO8 would be a Galaga style game.

The game scales in difficulty the more points you score.

But don't worry, every 100k points is an extra shield to protect yourself.

Hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it!

Controls:

Z and X : Shoot Horizontally or Vertically, respectively

Arrow Keys : Move

Ctrl + R : Reset game
